name: Meltdown (itch) (Dihara Wijetunga)
description:
Meltdown is a Horde mode shooter that is all about maintaining an unstable reactor by protecting it from enemy forces. 

Destroy incoming waves of enemies and collect coolant  to maintain the stability of your reactor core. Collect scrap to set up turrets and mines to  defend against ever increasing enemies. 

How long can you last?

Changelog

Version 1.01

  • Made the cursor visible during gameplay for people who were having difficulties when playing with a keyboard and mouse.

Controls (Keyboard/Gamepad)

WASD/Left Stick = Movement

Mouse/Right Stick = Aim

Q/Y = Lay mine

E/X = Deploy turret

Left Shift/A = Dash

Mouse Scroll Wheel/Left and Right bumper = Cycle turrets 

Left Click/Left trigger = Fire Left arm weapon

Right Click/Right Trigger = Fire right arm weapon
